mapper.select: SELECT b.sub_nm , d.pro_nm FROM student a JOIN course_regist c ON a.std_no = c.std_no JOIN lecture_aply e ON c.lecap_no = e.lecap_no JOIN subject b ON e.sub_no = b.sub_no JOIN professor d ON e.pro_no = d.pro_no WHERE a.std_no = #{stdNo}

SELECT c.lecap_no , b.sub_nm , c.lecap_yr , c.lecap_sem FROM professor a JOIN lecture_aply c ON c.pro_no = a.pro_no JOIN subject b ON c.sub_no = b.sub_no WHERE a.pro_no = #{proNo} and c.aprv_stts_cd like 'appv' and c.lecap_yr like TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY') AND c.lecap_sem = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM')) BETWEEN 2 AND 6 THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM')) BETWEEN 7 AND 12 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END

SELECT a.asm_no, a.lecap_no, a.asm_week, a.asm_ttl, a.asm_cn, a.asm_pro_nm, a.asm_regdate, a.atch_file_no
FROM assignment a JOIN lecture_aply l ON l.lecap_no = a.lecap_no
WHERE l.lecap_no = #{lecapNo} AND l.lecap_yr like TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY') AND l.lecap_sem = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM')) BETWEEN 2 AND 6 THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM')) BETWEEN 7 AND 12 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END
